feed.title: Honey Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Honey: v2.2.3-stable
entry.content:
:memo: Release notes

:new: Changes

  • Drop Progressive Web App support (it was broken anyway)
  • Docker improvements #5

:hammer_and_wrench: Development

  • bump to Vite V5

entry.title: New release for Honey: v2.3.0-stable
entry.content:
:memo: Release notes

:warning: BREAKING CHANGES! :warning:

Before update, please update dark_mode in your config.json file to one of the following values: Auto, Off, On (they're case-sensitive!)

  • config.json diff

:new: Changes

  • Add support for host OS based theming (switch between light/dark mode according to system settings)
  • Apple Touch Icon #7

:hammer_and_wrench: Development

  • no major changes

entry.title: New release for Honey: v2.3.1-stable
entry.content:
:memo: Release notes

hotfix

:new: Changes

  • Fixed broken Theme button on homescreen

entry.title: New release for Honey: v2.4.0-stable
entry.content:
:memo: Release notes

:new: Changes

  • Added Trusted Domains mentioned in #4
  • Added uptime indicators (currently they are handled client-side, unexpected behavior may happen with 3rd parties)
  • honey theme is no longer being synced with system when "Dark" is enforced in settings

entry.title: New release for Honey: v2.4.1-stable
entry.content:
:memo: Release notes

:new: Changes

  • Fixed open_new_tab not being applied on load (issue #9)
